text:
#AnthemProject: Let the harmonised vocals of Chris Hani Secondary School soothe you

Submitted by: 0 Votes Share this on

The Deputy Minister of Arts and Culture has recently hoisted the RSA and AU Flags at Chris Hani secondary school as part of the International Mother Language event that was held in Khayelitsha. It is an Arts School that has a very gifted school choir which has been requested by the Deputy Minister to be utilised by the DAC at some of the national Events organised by DAC. The school has also been identified as a best practice for reciting the preamble of the RSA Constitution, during the Flag Hoisting Programme at schools.

Watch as the students wow you with their soothing harmonies.
